name: Web App Basic Template
tagline: Web App Basic Template for every day use, based on Adobe CS6 Basic Template
body:
## Web App Template for everyday use

![web app banner](http://ignaciogaldames.tk/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/web-app-basic-template.jpg)

**Available in HTML and PHP**

This contains the basics for a ready-to-use web app that includes the meta-names and links for:

**Web app on**
Meta-names for an IOS web app capability

**Web app icon**
IOS standard icon support

**Web app splash screen**
Multiple app splash screens supported

**Standard Favicon**
Multiple favicon support

**Opera Speed Dial Favicon**
Just in case

**Animate:**
For a quick animation of you web app

**Add 2 Home**
Support for Add to home feature

**Google Fonts**
Simple google fonts added

**Web App Images in Illustrator and EPS format**
Original images in Illustrator and  EPS format in ready-to-design templates


### Commented Code
![Web App Basic Template](http://ignaciogaldames.tk/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/webapp.jpg)

### Try it for yourself

Feel free to ask for a feature or to help to build this basic template for web apps.

### Thanks 

This includes the works of @cubiq with https://github.com/cubiq/add-to-homescreen and @daneden with Animate https://github.com/daneden/animate.css

Also @subtlepatterns for the background image for the Retina Image support

### Support or Contact

Follow my Github Account @caminantestelar and find me on My Personal Blog http://ignaciogaldames.tk
